title: Was THIS Hollywood Story Built On Lies?
description:
Michael Oher, a retired professional football player whose life story became the basis for the Oscar-winning movie “The Blind Side,” says the white, wealthy family who took him in never actually adopted him, as the film suggests. Oher is alleging that Sean and Leigh Anne Tuohy tricked him into signing a document that made them his conservators – not his adopted parents – thereby giving them legal authority to make financial decisions in his name.

title: Biden Lounges While Maui Burns
description:
Joe Biden was at the beach in Delaware when asked about the enormous tragedy in Maui, where the deadliest wildfire in the U.S. in the last 100 years. His response was simply "No comment." This is not the first time he's ignored a massive disaster.
